title: Evangelism
shrt: Welcome to the Jesus Saves Evangelistic Series at Newlife SDA Church, 5th Ngong Avenue, Nairobi Kenya.......
categorie: I WILL GO | JESUS SAVES | EVANGELISTIC SERIES
description: Give the winds a mighty voice, Jesus saves, Jesus saves; Let the nations now rejoice, Jesus saves, Jesus saves; Shout salvation full and free, Highest hills and deepest caves, This our song of victory, Jesus saves, Jesus saves.
